Tool

NameClip Grid with Rectangle
ID11
AuthorV. Wichmann (c) 2013

Description

Clips the input grid with the (rectangular) extent of a shapefile. The clipped grid will have the extent of the shapefile. Select shapes from the shapefile prior to module execution in case you like to use only a subset from the shapefile for clipping.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Input Grid (input)INPUTThe grid to clip.
Extent Shapes (input)SHAPESThe shapefile to use for clipping.
Output
Output (*)Data Object (optional output)OUTPUTThe clipped grid.
Options
BorderChoiceBORDERSet grid extent to grid cells (pixel as area), to grid nodes (pixel as point) or align to grid system.Available Choices: [0] grid cells [1] grid nodes [2] align to grid system Default: 0
(*) optional
